title: Houtai Shoujo Aiwa: Kokuchou no Noroi
original_name: 包帯少女哀話～黒蝶の呪い～
sinopse: A girl who ungraceful died can make all wishes be granted at Shinto shrine. Anyone who write down their wishes on a piece of cloth and tied it on the shrine will be granted. But then they will get some bad ending in the end..happiness or tragedy...
